sys_ux_client_script_include.name: Obtener Filtros Include

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_include_50e373e0dbda0510f7265eea4b9619fb
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script_include"><sys_ux_client_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><api_name>x_issas_gesti_n_0.Obtener  Filtros Include</api_name><includes/><name>Obtener  Filtros Include</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[
function include({imports}) { 
    getFiltro: () =>{
          var now = new Date();
          var start = new Date(now.getFullYear(), 0, 0);
          var diff = (now - start) + ((start.getTimezoneOffset() - now.getTimezoneOffset()) * 60 * 1000);
          var oneDay = 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24;
          var day = Math.floor(diff / oneDay);
          return day;
  
      };
      return ({
        getFiltro
    });
  }]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>idramirez</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-14 23:07:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>50e373e0dbda0510f7265eea4b9619fb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Obtener  Filtros Include</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Gestión de Oportunidades" source="x_issas_gesti_n_0">e6fcd7aedb86c110f7265eea4b961914</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Gestión de Oportunidades">e6fcd7aedb86c110f7265eea4b961914</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_include_50e373e0dbda0510f7265eea4b9619fb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>idramirez</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-14 23:12:47</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_client_script_include></record_update>
